name: getManagedIssue
description:
Returns a single Issue that is impacting or did impact one of your
Managed Services.

This command can only be accessed by the unrestricted users of an account.

$block: An Issue that was detected with a service Linode is managing.

$ul: **created**: When this Issue was created. Issues are created in response to issues detected with Managed Services, so this is also when the Issue was detected.
**entity**: The ticket this Managed Issue opened.
**type**: The type of entity this is. In this case, it is always a Ticket.
**url**: The relative URL where you can access this Ticket.
**services**: An array of Managed Service IDs that were affected by this Issue.
